org.logl.logl

Interface FileRotationStrategy


  • public interface FileRotationStrategy
    A strategy for controlling rotation in RotatingFilePrintWriterSupplier.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FileRotationStrategy forSize(long thresholdBytes, long delayMillis)
      Obtain a strategy based on the number of bytes written to the output file.
      void rotationCompleted()
      Will be called to notify the strategy that rotation has been completed.
      boolean shouldRotate(java.nio.file.Path outputFile, long bytesWritten)
      Determine if a rotation should occur.

    • Method Detail

      • forSize

        static FileRotationStrategy forSize(long thresholdBytes,
                                    long delayMillis)
        Obtain a strategy based on the number of bytes written to the output file.
        Parameters:
        thresholdBytes - The number of bytes that should trigger rotation.
        delayMillis - A delay, in milliseconds, after a previous rotation before another is requested.
        Returns:
        A rotation strategy.

      • shouldRotate

        boolean shouldRotate(java.nio.file.Path outputFile,
                     long bytesWritten)
        Determine if a rotation should occur.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - The output file.
        bytesWritten - The number of bytes written to the file.
        Returns:
        true if a rotation should occur.

      • rotationCompleted

        void rotationCompleted()
        Will be called to notify the strategy that rotation has been completed.

        This can be used to reset any timers, etc.
